alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 09 at 6:48AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is expected to continue as floodwater recedes. * WHERE...Central Fannin and Lamar Counties. * WHEN...Until 900 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some roadways will remain flooded for the next several hours. Creeks, streams, and small river flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - New flooding is no longer expected to pose a threat. However, earlier rainfall will continue to run off and cause flooding. Please continue to heed remaining road closures. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Paris, Bonham, Reno, Honey Grove, Whitewright, Blossom, Savoy, Ector, Roxton, Trenton, Dodd City, Ravenna, Crockett Lake, Coffee Mill Lake, Sumner, Lake Gibbons, Lake Crook, Pat Mayse Lake, Camp Maxey and Lake Bonham.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
